name: goaway
tagline: A lightweight reverse proxy providing access control and custom responses
description: GoAway is a small reverse proxy written in Go that provides access control and custom HTTP responses. It's designed for small deployments where simplicity and performance are necessary.

features.title: URL Redirection
features.description: Redirect requests from one URL to another

features.title: Rule-Based Routing
features.description: Define redirect rules using configuration files

features.title: HTTP Status Control
features.description: Configure redirect status codes for responses

features.title: Lightweight Service
features.description: Run a minimal redirect service with low overhead

features.title: Configuration Reload
features.description: Update redirect rules without restarting the service

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the redirect service on your own infrastructure
